Sencast
  • HDA API
  • View page source

HDA APIÔÉÅ

Sencast uses the HDA API to query the image database in order to identify suitable images and also to download images.

Documentation for HDA API can be found here.

dias_apis.hda.hda.accept_tc_if_required(access_token)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.authenticate(env)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.dataorder_download(access_token, order_id, filename)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.do_download(auth, download_request, product_path)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.get_access_token(auth)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.get_datarequest_results(access_token, job_id)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.get_dataset_id(sensor, resolution)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.get_download_requests(auth, start, end, sensor, resolution, wkt, env)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.post_dataorder(access_token, job_id, uri)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.post_datarequest(access_token, datarequest)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.query_metadata(access_token, dataset_id)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.wait_for_dataorder_to_complete(access_token, order_id)ÔÉÅ
dias_apis.hda.hda.wait_for_datarequest_to_complete(access_token, job_id)ÔÉÅ
